add_row_to_sheet.description: Adds new row to a sheet.

props.name: location_type
props.displayName: Add Row to Top or Bottom

attach_file_to_row.description: Adds a file attachment to a row.

props.name: attachment_type
props.description: Type of attachment to add

props.name: file
props.description: The file to attach (required for FILE type)

props.name: url
props.description: The URL to attach (required for URL-based attachment types)

props.name: attachment_name
props.description: Name for the attachment (optional, will use file name or URL if not provided)

props.name: attachment_sub_type
props.description: Sub type for Google Drive and Egnyte attachments

props.name: mime_type
props.description: MIME type of the attachment (optional, auto-detected for files)

find_attachment_by_row_id.description: Get all attachments for a specific row in a Smartsheet, including row and discussion-level attachments with comprehensive pagination and filtering options

props.name: include_all
props.description: If true, include all results without pagination (overrides page and page size)

props.name: page
props.description: Which page to return (defaults to 1, ignored if "Include All Results" is true)

props.name: page_size
props.description: Maximum number of items to return per page (defaults to 100, max 10000, ignored if "Include All Results" is true)

props.name: attachment_type_filter
props.description: Only return attachments of specific types (leave empty for all types)

props.name: parent_type_filter
props.description: Only return attachments from specific parent types (leave empty for all)

props.name: min_file_size_kb
props.description: Only return files with size greater than or equal to this value (applies to FILE type only)

props.name: max_file_size_kb
props.description: Only return files with size less than or equal to this value (applies to FILE type only)

find_rows_by_query.description: Finds rows in a specific sheet or across all accessible sheets using text queries with advanced filtering options.

props.name: search_scope
props.description: Choose whether to search within a specific sheet or across all accessible sheets.

props.name: query
props.description: Text to search for. Use double quotes for exact phrase matching (e.g., "project status")

props.name: search_scopes
props.description: Specify what types of content to search in (leave empty to search all)

props.name: include_favorites
props.description: Include information about which items are marked as favorites

props.name: modified_since
props.description: Only return results modified on or after this date/time

props.name: max_results
props.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 50, max: 100)

props.name: object_types_filter
props.description: Only return results of specific object types (leave empty for all types)

find_sheet_by_name.description: Fetches existings sheets matching provided filter criteria.

props.name: sheet_name
props.description: Filter sheets by name (partial or exact match). Leave empty to list all sheets.

props.name: exact_match
props.description: When filtering by name, require exact match instead of partial match

props.name: include_all
props.description: If true, include all results without pagination (overrides page and page size)

props.name: page
props.description: Which page to return (defaults to 1, ignored if "Include All Results" is true)

props.name: page_size
props.description: Maximum number of items to return per page (defaults to 100, max 10000, ignored if "Include All Results" is true)

props.name: access_api_level
props.description: API access level for viewing and filtering permissions

props.name: access_level_filter
props.description: Only return sheets where you have specific access levels (leave empty for all)

props.name: modified_since
props.description: Only return sheets modified on or after this date/time

props.name: include_sheet_version
props.description: Include current version number of each sheet

props.name: include_source_info
props.description: Include information about the source (template/sheet) each sheet was created from

props.name: numeric_dates
props.description: Return dates as milliseconds since UNIX epoch instead of ISO strings

props.name: created_date_range
props.description: Filter sheets by creation date range

props.name: sort_by
props.description: How to sort the returned sheets

new_attachment_.description: Triggers when a new attachment is added to a row or sheet.

new_comment_webhook.description: Triggers when a new comment is added to a discussion on a sheet.

new_row_added.description: Triggers when a new row is added.

updated_row.description: Triggers when an existing row is updated.
